ai-patthana24.14:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.14:1.1_0: You don’t give rise to a refuge for the sake of causes and reasons.
ai-patthana24.14:1.1_1: or cause or reason why the teaching doesn’t give rise to refuge, there is no cause or reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.14:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.14:2.1_0: or cause or reason why the teaching doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana24.14:3.1_5: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
